Intro.Title: Inclusive development to all & for all!
Intro.Paragraph: is a financial cooperative established in 2015 EC with a mission to provide easy access to savings and credit services for all, especially those who might not qualify for traditional banking options

OurBelieve.Title: Our guiding principles
OurBelieve.MissionParagraph: Providing savings and credit services easily with modern technology

Values1.name: Helping members achieve financial freedom, simplify their lives and live their dreams.

Values2.name: Being able to support hardworking employees with low income sources will enable them to reach their earning potential.

Values3.name: Meet the needs of the user society by generating long-term financial reserves.

Values4.name: Reducing unemployment and economic problems as a responsible stakeholder.

Values5.name: To develop and expand savings and loan services among members and the community.

Values6.name: Build a large-scale membership of the largest financial provider association in Ethiopia.

Values7.name: Providing loan services by encouraging unsecured workers who wanted to use loan services.

Values8.name: Being able to make a positive impact in the financial sector.

Uniqueness.Uniqueness1: Our accessibility for all type and level of businesses.
Uniqueness.Uniqueness3: Providing loan without any material collaterals.

Testimonials.Title: What our customers say about us

statement1.name: Ato Alemneh mengesha
statement1.text: With the money from Yehulu saving and credit association, I was able to improve my work and manage myself and my family without any trouble.

statement2.name: W/ro Senedu Mathews
statement2.text: I was able to expand my business with the short term loan service I received from Yehulu saving and loan association

statement3.name: Ato  Altesa Petros
statement3.text: My success started at the day I become family with Yehulu saving and loan association

LoanSaving.Title: To become a member of our service

Step2.step: Be Willing to save from a minimum of 10 birr a day

Step3.step: Be Willing to buy a minimum of 50 lotteries of price 100birr each

Step6.step: Be willing to accept and follow terms and conditions

service1.title: Regular savings
service1.desc: This type of savings allows the members of the association to increase their saving habit by saving at least 10 Birr every day and it is the duty of all members to save accordingly.

service2.title: Time deposit
service2.desc: It is a type of savings in which the individual get better interest service by saving time limit deposit up-to 20% of the amount he/she made agreement more than half a year period.

service3.title: Home Purchase Savings
service3.desc: It is a type of savings in which the individual saves 30% to become a home owner.

service4.title: Vehicle Purchase Savings
service4.desc: The person can save 50% of the vehicle ownership and get the type of vehicle of their choice.

service5.title: Demand Savings
service5.desc: This type of savings is a type of savings in which themembers or non-members willingly deposit their money in the cooperative society and can earn or spend their money at any time and qualify for loan services.

service6.title: Children's Savings
service6.desc: It is a type of savings that parents save for their children under 18 years of age.

service7.title: Taxi Savings
service7.desc: This is a type of savings where taxi owners save from their daily income to upgrade their vehicles type.

service8.title: My Drive Savings
service8.desc: This is a type of savings where taxi owners save from their daily income to upgrade their vehicles type

service4.title: For a purchase of a house

AboutUs.Question: Who are we?
AboutUs.Paragraph1: is a financial cooperative established in 2015 EC with a mission to provide easy access to savings and credit services for all, especially those who might not qualify for traditional banking options. We offer a variety of savings plans, including regular savings, time deposits, and home and vehicle purchase savings accounts
AboutUs.Paragraph2: Traditional banks can feel intimidating, with complex processes and high barriers to entry. We knew there had to be a better way! That is where Yehulu comes in. We are here to make saving and getting credit straightforward and accessible for everyone.

ContactForm.MessageSent: Your response has been recorded successfully! We will get back to you soon.
ContactForm.MessageSentFailed: There was an error sending your message. Please try again later.

EligibilityCriteria.Statement: What do you need to fulfill to become eligible for loan services

Criterias.Criteria1: 30% of requested loan amount personal contribution account maintained Loan saving account for 30 consecutive days for 100 & 200 days loan and 16 week for 350 days loan without fail.
Criterias.Criteria2: The account ledger should checked by credit department for further loan process.
Criterias.Criteria3: If loan saving account deposit fails/ deteriorated the daily or weekly schedule, loan processing and disbursement date increase by same date.
Criterias.Criteria4: Loan application, it should disclose purpose of the loan, loan request amount, and loan period and repayment mode.
Criterias.Criteria5: Personal identification of renewed ID, TIN, Passport etc
Criterias.Criteria6: Mirage Certificate, TIN number, Renewed Trade Licenses and Registration, Tax Clearance.
Criterias.Criteria8: Purchasing of 50 shares, with the value of 5,000 Birr.
Criterias.Criteria9: The loan customer/members have 50% borrowing capacity of Demand (Filagot) saving account turnover.
Criterias.Criteria10: Signed loan contract format between Yehulu and loan customer/members.

LoanTypes.Statement: Different types of loan services we offer

Stepper.Step1: Check the above eligibility documents and request by loan processing unit
Stepper.Step3: Check and approve or/ Send back to fulfill or correct

Question1.question: What do we do?
Question1.answer: We provide accessible savings and credit services to all, utilizing modern technology to facilitate financial inclusion. Our unique offerings include no-collateral loans, personalized savings plans, and door-to-door services, ensuring comprehensive financial support for individuals and businesses.

Question2.question: Do I need collateral for all loan services provided by Yehulu?
Question2.answer: No, we offer loan packages where collateral aren’t needed depending on the business profitability and if the customer is a member of our organization. contact us or see the loan and eligibility sections to learn more.

Question3.question: What kind of business ventures and expansions does Yehulu support?
Question3.answer: Yehulu supports various business ventures and expansions including social services, business expansion projects, vehicle purchases, and home purchases. Our loan services are designed to cater to these needs, offering flexible repayment terms and accessible financial support to help businesses and individuals achieve their goals.

Question4.question: Does Yehulu have interest rates?
Question4.answer: Yes, we offer a variety of loan options with competitive interest rates designed to meet your financial needs. Our team is dedicated to providing flexible terms and personalized service to ensure you find the best loan for your situation. To get more detailed information about our loan amounts and interest rates, we invite you to contact us directly. We will be happy to discuss your specific requirements and provide you with a tailored solution that fits your budget and goals. Please reach out to us at your earliest convenience to set up a consultation. We look forward to assisting you in securing the financing you need.

Question5.question: How much time do I need to wait after becoming a member to get loans?
Question5.answer: After becoming a member of Yehulu, you need to maintain a loan saving account for 30 consecutive days to qualify for loans of 100 and 200 days, and for 16 weeks to qualify for a 350-day loan. During this period, you must consistently save 30% of the requested loan amount.
